name: Ball Arena
description:
(This is my first game. I know it is a bit bad, but just do not mind it)

Ball Arena is a game where two balls fight each other and try to make each other fall in the lava. But what makes the game hard is, the controls! If you do not believe me, try it!

Controls:

Red Player: WASD

Blue Player The arrows

Up arrow/W to move forward

Right arrow/D to move right

Left arrow/A to move left

Down arrow/S to move backwards.

I know no one will play this, but if you played it,  thank you so much!
